pages.text: The End Portal was used to transport all of the Shadow Court into the End. It now is considered as a way to teleport to the end if needed. The only way to open the End Portal is to find its location and open it with the end Crystals.

pages.title: Ender Eyes
pages.text: You can use the the ender pearls to create 'ender eyes' they can sense where the energy of the end, is leaking into our world!
